name: User is able to configure and trigger periodic builds as scheduled.
description: A User can enable the "Build periodically trigger" in a Freestyle project and that the build runs according to the specified schedule.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

steps.name: Create unique name
Create data for Freestyle project "freestyle-api-b957e844" scheduled every 1 min
Generate a new Jenkins API token for the current user.
Fetch Jenkins CSRF crumb
POST to generate new token: api-token
Sending POST to create item: freestyle-api-b957e844 with config.xml as attached.
